name: Aung Pyae Kyaw
biography:
He is a self taught graphic designer, with an interest in all things related to design. He started his design journey as a volunteer graphic designer at his college making graphics for different events.

He is, now, working as a graphic designer @ Citizens Interior Design Studio, working on branding, social media, environmental graphics, furniture, accessories, textiles etc.

During the pandemic in 2020, he started Duo Design Lab with his friend, Yan Aung Hein, as a little blog on Facebook sharing a variety of contents and resources for designers. In September 2022, Yan Aung and he co-founded Duo Design Lab as a boutique web design studio.

name: Yan Aung Hein
biography:
He is a table-tennis player and a self taught web developer. As an ui/ux enthusiast, he is passionate, especially, in frontend development crafting user-interfaces to make the web beautiful and valuable to business. He started his web development journey by building websites with Webflow, a no-code tool for web development.

He is, now, working as a frontend developer @ APM Help taking part in Webflow and SvelteKit projects.

During the pandemic in 2020, he started Duo Design Lab with his friend, Aung Pyaw Kyaw, as a little blog on Facebook sharing a variety of contents and resources for designers. In September 2022, Aung Pyae and he co-founded Duo Design Lab as a boutique web design studio.
